attributes.action: THE FREE MOVEMENT OF PEOPLE SHOULD BE REJECTED AT ANY COST
attributes.additional_details:
The result of the 23rd of June Referendum where the people of UK has spoken clearly and loudly by a majority of 52% to 48% to leave the EU, has been mainly driven by immigration fears as clearly pointed out by the PM to the EU leaders yesterday.

Under this circumstances, the democratic wish of the people should be respected, and therefore the free movement of people should be rejected
attributes.background: We the undersigned call upon HM Government to reject the free movement of people at any cost at our negotiation with the EU
